sentences.english: At the same time, remind him that you're always there for his should he seek advice or help.
sentences.chinese: 同時，提醒他，他隨時可以找你尋問建議或幫助。

sentences.english: So dear, never hesitate to ask and even to give answer.
sentences.chinese: 並卟媞那庅連懟事，尋問，給予歸答絕懟請猶豫。

definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
to whisper to one another's ear
out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
